Observed at: West Vancouver 2:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: ESE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wet flurries over higher terrain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Wet flurries over higher terrain in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
